name: OrderProcessing
bpmn_xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<bpmn:definitions xmlns:bpmn="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:dc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:di="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" id="Definitions_1" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn">
  <bpmn:process id="OrderProcessing" name="Order Processing" isExecutable="true">
    <bpmn:startEvent id="StartEvent_1" name="Order Received">
      <bpmn:outgoing>Flow_1</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:startEvent>
    <bpmn:serviceTask id="ValidateOrder" name="Validate Order">
      <bpmn:incoming>Flow_1</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>Flow_2</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:serviceTask>
    <bpmn:userTask id="ApproveOrder" name="Approve Order">
      <bpmn:incoming>Flow_2</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>Flow_3</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:userTask>
    <bpmn:serviceTask id="ProcessPayment" name="Process Payment">
      <bpmn:incoming>Flow_3</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>Flow_4</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:serviceTask>
    <bpmn:endEvent id="EndEvent_1" name="Order Completed">
      <bpmn:incoming>Flow_4</bpmn:incoming>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="Flow_1" sourceRef="StartEvent_1" targetRef="ValidateOrder" />
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="Flow_2" sourceRef="ValidateOrder" targetRef="ApproveOrder" />
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="Flow_3" sourceRef="ApproveOrder" targetRef="ProcessPayment" />
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="Flow_4" sourceRef="ProcessPayment" targetRef="EndEvent_1" />
  </bpmn:process>
</bpmn:definitions>

name: UserRegistration
bpmn_xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<bpmn:definitions xmlns:bpmn="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:dc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:di="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" id="Definitions_1" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn">
  <bpmn:process id="UserRegistration" name="User Registration" isExecutable="true">
    <bpmn:startEvent id="StartEvent_1" name="Registration Started">
      <bpmn:outgoing>Flow_1</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:startEvent>
    <bpmn:serviceTask id="ValidateEmail" name="Validate Email">
      <bpmn:incoming>Flow_1</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>Flow_2</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:serviceTask>
    <bpmn:serviceTask id="SendVerificationEmail" name="Send Verification Email">
      <bpmn:incoming>Flow_2</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>Flow_3</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:serviceTask>
    <bpmn:userTask id="VerifyEmail" name="Verify Email">
      <bpmn:incoming>Flow_3</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>Flow_4</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:userTask>
    <bpmn:serviceTask id="ActivateAccount" name="Activate Account">
      <bpmn:incoming>Flow_4</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>Flow_5</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:serviceTask>
    <bpmn:endEvent id="EndEvent_1" name="Registration Completed">
      <bpmn:incoming>Flow_5</bpmn:incoming>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="Flow_1" sourceRef="StartEvent_1" targetRef="ValidateEmail" />
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="Flow_2" sourceRef="ValidateEmail" targetRef="SendVerificationEmail" />
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="Flow_3" sourceRef="SendVerificationEmail" targetRef="VerifyEmail" />
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="Flow_4" sourceRef="VerifyEmail" targetRef="ActivateAccount" />
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="Flow_5" sourceRef="ActivateAccount" targetRef="EndEvent_1" />
  </bpmn:process>
</bpmn:definitions>

name: DocumentApproval
bpmn_xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<bpmn:definitions xmlns:bpmn="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:dc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:di="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" id="Definitions_1" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn">
  <bpmn:process id="DocumentApproval" name="Document Approval" isExecutable="true">
    <bpmn:startEvent id="StartEvent_1" name="Document Submitted">
      <bpmn:outgoing>Flow_1</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:startEvent>
    <bpmn:userTask id="ReviewDocument" name="Review Document">
      <bpmn:incoming>Flow_1</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>Flow_2</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:userTask>
    <bpmn:exclusiveGateway id="Gateway_1" name="Approved?">
      <bpmn:incoming>Flow_2</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>Flow_Approved</bpmn:outgoing>
      <bpmn:outgoing>Flow_Rejected</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:exclusiveGateway>
    <bpmn:serviceTask id="ApproveDocument" name="Approve Document">
      <bpmn:incoming>Flow_Approved</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>Flow_3</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:serviceTask>
    <bpmn:serviceTask id="RejectDocument" name="Reject Document">
      <bpmn:incoming>Flow_Rejected</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>Flow_4</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:serviceTask>
    <bpmn:endEvent id="EndEvent_Approved" name="Document Approved">
      <bpmn:incoming>Flow_3</bpmn:incoming>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:endEvent id="EndEvent_Rejected" name="Document Rejected">
      <bpmn:incoming>Flow_4</bpmn:incoming>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="Flow_1" sourceRef="StartEvent_1" targetRef="ReviewDocument" />
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="Flow_2" sourceRef="ReviewDocument" targetRef="Gateway_1" />
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="Flow_Approved" name="Approved" sourceRef="Gateway_1" targetRef="ApproveDocument">
      <bpmn:conditionExpression>${approved == true}</bpmn:conditionExpression>
    </bpmn:sequenceFlow>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="Flow_Rejected" name="Rejected" sourceRef="Gateway_1" targetRef="RejectDocument">
      <bpmn:conditionExpression>${approved == false}</bpmn:conditionExpression>
    </bpmn:sequenceFlow>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="Flow_3" sourceRef="ApproveDocument" targetRef="EndEvent_Approved" />
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="Flow_4" sourceRef="RejectDocument" targetRef="EndEvent_Rejected" />
  </bpmn:process>
</bpmn:definitions>
